text: wmn kafar fala tas ealayh -ayha alrswl- wala thzn; lank addayt ma ealayk min aldaewat walblagh, 'iilayna marjieuhum wmsyrhm yawm alqyamt, fnkhbrhm baemalhm alkhbytht alty emlwha fi aldnya, thuma njazyhm elyha, 'iina allah ealim bima tukinnuh sudurihim min alkufr biallah w'iythar taeat alshytan
